name: Bozos Theme Park
description:
This project is a choose your own adventure game proof of concept. This game will be completely reworked into a fully animated, fully colored, fully voiced over game with a lot of endings and replay ability. But in order to do that, I need some help. This post is to put my idea out to the world and find some like minded people that are willing to help me. I have no budget so you will have to help for free but if the game does well then we will split the profit according to effort and position.(This also depends on how much help I get. It will most likely be even...)

If you are interested then please contact me here--> meltdownstudios2022@gmail.com

Together we will be MeltdownStudios! 

Thanks in advance, Mr.Meltdown.
